title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 59/81 of 1 January 1981 laying down transitional measures for Greece in respect of minimum stocks of sugar
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 59/81
OF 1 JANUARY 1981
LAYING DOWN TRANSITIONAL MEASURES FOR GREECE IN RESPECT OF MINIMUM STOCKS OF SUGAR
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: THE PROVISIONS OF ARTICLE 1 ( A ) OF REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 1488/76 SHALL APPLY TO THE GREEK SUGAR MANUFACTURER ONLY IN RESPECT OF SUGAR PRODUCED ON OR AFTER 1 JANUARY 1981 .

THIS REGULATION SHALL ENTER INTO FORCE ON 1 JANUARY 1981 .
THIS REGULATION SHALL BE BINDING IN ITS ENTIRETY AND DIRECTLY APPLICABLE IN ALL MEMBER STATES .
attachments:
DONE AT BRUSSELS , 1 JANUARY 1981 .
FOR THE COMMISSION
THE PRESIDENT
